ai-thi-ap3:1.2_0: I’ve created a realm of creeper.
ai-thi-ap3:1.4_0: the Buddha’s bonds of the world.
ai-thi-ap3:2.3_0: I pay homage to the Dhamma,
ai-thi-ap3:3.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
ai-thi-ap3:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-thi-ap3:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the nun Māgaṇḍiya.
ai-thi-ap3:7.1_0: a third part of the senior monks, etc.
